item.title: Tesla shares sink 8%, giving up some gains from post-election pop
item.description: Tesla shares dropped more than 8% on Wednesday, their biggest decline since before Trump's election victory, which has been a big spark for the stock.

item.title: Fed cuts by a quarter point, indicates fewer reductions ahead
item.description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday announced its decision on interest rates.

item.title: The Federal Reserve cuts interest rates by another quarter point. Here's what that means for you
item.description: The central bank has now shaved a full percentage off its benchmark rate since September. Here's what it means for your borrowing costs.
